subject: Football
lead_paragraph: L.S.U. quarterback JaMarcus Russell, who ran for one touchdown and threw for two others, was alternately bruising and brilliant in leading the No. 4-ranked Tigers to a drubbing of the No. 11 Fighting Irish.
snippet: L.S.U. quarterback JaMarcus Russell, who ran for one touchdown and threw for two others, was alternately bruising and brilliant in leading the No. 4-ranked Tigers to a drubbing of the No. 11 Fighting Irish.
